rules.title: <title> in concepts
rules.abstract: Concept titles are a single word or expression that identifies what the concept defines.

rule.rule-statement: When titles can be expressed as acronyms, reference their glossentry.
rule.justification: It lets processing rules define when to display surface forms or acronyms.

rule.rule-statement: Use the singular form whenever it is possible.

ul.li: Better interpolarity with glossary entries that enables access to the surface form and existing definition for reuse in the abstract.
Better differentiation with references that are collection of entries and therefore often under a plural title.
